ygData.subject: Buying advice needed...
ygData.msgSnippet: If this question isn t appropriate for this list, let me apologize in advance.... I don t see many questions like it.... Anyway, I m a lvl 12 Gnome wizard,
ygData.messageBody:
If this question isn't appropriate for this list, let me apologize in
advance.... I don't see many questions like it....
Anyway,
I'm a lvl 12 Gnome wizard, have cloth armor, worn great staff, Sr.
Apprentice Robe and pretty much all the spells that I want (that I can buy).
I've got 25 plat or so in the bank and don't know what to spend it
on....invest in better armor? better staff? magic items? if so, what? don't
know what's smartest. Would very much appreciate any advice anyone can give
me that wish's they'd bought or didn't buy at my level. Thanx for any help
you can give me.
